BEAST::call_on_mem_t< T, M, OP > Class Template Reference
[Utilities and Helper Functions]

Allows us to bind functors so that they work on particular members of classes, useful for using for_each on maps. More...

Detailed Description

template<class T, typename M, class OP>
class BEAST::call_on_mem_t< T, M, OP >

Allows us to bind functors so that they work on particular members of classes, useful for using for_each on maps.
